component.name: Jomolhari
component.summary: Jomolhari a Bhutanese style font for Tibetan and Dzongkha

description.p: Jomolhari is an TrueType OpenType Bhutanese style font for Dzongkha and Tibetan text. It is based on Bhutanese manuscript examples, supports the Unicode and the Chinese encoding for Tibetan. The font supports the standard combinations used in most texts.
